nodes.text: Begun, The Clone Wars Have! is an adventure for Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars roleplaying systems that was made available to attendees of Gen Con 2019. It is based off the supplemental guide Rise of the Separatists.

During the Clone Wars, a group of representatives, Jedi, and veteran troopers are visiting new clone trooper training on Kamino when a simulation chamber malfunctions. After getting the chance to look around, the exercise begins.
A group of clone troopers and droids start moving through the chamber. During the simulated battle, an explosion goes off in the chamber.

After the explosion, the delegates and Kaminoan scientists react to the explosion. The training droids then start firing on the viewing area and the delgates. The chamber then malfunctions further, sending an avalanche of the snow toward them.
The group is forced to act to survive the malfunction. Once they are clear, remaining training droids re-surface and approach to attack.
At the same time, Kaj Loomit reveals himself as the saboteur, trying to eradicate the Republic war effort. The group acts in concert to defeat him.
